title: Strange Signposts: An Anthology Of The Fantastic - ed. by Sam Moskowitz & Roger Elwood (1966) {LennyS-AMouse}
description: CONTENTS: Strange Signposts ed. Roger Elwood & Sam Moskowitz (Holt, Rinehart & Winston, 1966, hc) The Other Side Of The Curtain—A Reflection Of The Future · Roger Elwood & Sam Moskowitz · in The Last Man · Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley · ex Henry Colburn 1826 Mellonta Tauta · Edgar Allan Poe · ss Godey’s Lady’s Book February 1849 Rappaccini’s Daughter · Nathaniel Hawthorne · nv United States Magazine And Democratic Review December 1844 Hans Schnap’s Spy-Glass · Erckmann-Chatrian · ss The Chronic Argonauts · H. G. Wells · nv Science Schools Journal April 1888 (+2) The Begum’s Fortune · Jules Verne · ex 1879 Frank Reade Jr.’s Air Wonder · Luis P. Senarens · ss Boys Of New York 1876, as by Noname The Whisperer In Darkness · H. P. Lovecraft · na Weird Tales August 1931 The Man Who Saw The Future · Edmond Hamilton · ss Amazing October 1930 Prowler Of The Wastelands [Prowler] · Harl Vincent · ss Astounding April 1935 Skeleton Men Of Jupiter [Barsoom] · Edgar Rice Burroughs · na Amazing February 1943 Doodad · Ray Bradbury · ss Astounding September 1943 The Cosmic Express · Jack Williamson · ss Amazing November 1930 Castaway · Arthur C. Clarke · ss Fantasy, The Magazine Of Science Fiction April 1947, as by Charles Willis One Way To Mars · Robert Bloch · ss Weird Tales July 1945
